  • Constructor Details

    • Project

      public Project(String projectName, String projectAddress, String buildingType, int erfNumber, double projectCost)
      Project constructor.
      Parameters:
      projectName - the name of this project.
      projectAddress - the address of this project.
      buildingType - the type of building this project represents.
      erfNumber - the ERF number of this project.
      projectCost - the cost of this project.

    • markFinalized

      public Project markFinalized(String finalizationDate) throws DateTimeParseException, IllegalStateException
      Marks the project as finalized on date if all details are in order.
      Parameters:
      finalizationDate - the date this project was finalized on.
      Returns:
      the finalization status of the project.
      Throws:
      DateTimeParseException - if finalizationDate is not a valid date string.
      IllegalStateException - If this project connot be finalized (details missing).
